name: No Ordinary Elevator
description:
How much could possibly go wrong when entering an elevator?
Step in a see if you can find your way back out again.

Solve various puzzles and challenges to get out. Look everywhere and keep an open mind.
Interact with your surroundings by examining objects to find what you need to get out.
Can you solve all puzzles to get out?Features:
  • A variety of challenging puzzles with varying difficulty.
  • Test yourself in both logic puzzles and skill-based challenges.
  • Immersive environment.
  • Room-scale support.
  • Teleportation support.
